name: Alchemy Cards
description:
ALCHEMY CARDS

In the role of a great alchemist, you must accompany the knight on his dangerous path. It is you who, with your potions, help him defeat the monsters one by one.

The game is currently under development. There is only one enemy in the game, but soon there will be more. There will also be a gathering system and elemental potions.

It should be noted that the game was made for the game jam in a very short time, so some (many) gameplay features were not implemented.

Used assets in the game:

  • https://paperhatlizard.itch.io/cryos-mini-gui,
  • https://cheekyinkling.itch.io/shikashis-fantasy-icons-pack,
  • https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack,
  • https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero, Thank you!
